lines.text: So, who were you in bed with this time?
Cindy?! I thought Cindy moved back to Atlanta.
What, are you dating Cindy 2 again?
Cindy 4?! Oh, that's great. I guess with one more you get a free toaster?
[Lenny has just met a new girl whom he likes]
I just don't want to screw this one up.
Don't worry, it happens all by itself.
[Lenny just fell in love again and is discussing it with his best friend Joey]
Aw, Joe, this girl's so sweet I could eat her for lunch. I, I'd give her the moon if I could--
Pedestal? We're talkin' friggin' skyscrapers here!
